IntegrationName.description: The name of the integration. Must be a valid C# identifier

SampleProjectName.description: The sample project that uses the package

NugetPackageSearchName.description: The NuGet package to search for. Must be listed in Honeypot.IntegrationMap

MinVersion.description: The minimum version of the NuGet package to use. Must be in x.y.z format.

MaxVersionExclusive.description: The maximum version of the NuGet package to use (exclusive). Must be in x.y.z format.

VersionConditions.description: Array of version globs to use for testing

MinVersion.description: The minimum version to apply the condition to. Must be in x.y.z format.

MaxVersionExclusive.description: The maximum version (exclusive) to apply the condition to. Must be in x.y.z format.

ExcludeTargetFrameworks.description: Target frameworks that should not be used in the selected version range

IncludeOnlyTargetFrameworks.description: Only use the specified target frameworks in the selected version range

SkipAlpine.description: If true, packages in the range will not built on Alpine

SkipArm64.description: If true, packages in the range will not be built on Arm64

SpecificVersions.description: Specific versions to use when running selected versions. May use wildcards to indicate 'latest' of a particular range, e.g. 2.1.*, 2.*.*
